util:properties.prop: SELECT row_id, source_file_name, target_file_name, status FROM invoicing_cdr_file WHERE source_file_name = :file_name

INSERT INTO invoicing_cdr_file (source_file_name, target_file_name, file_type, status, error_description) VALUES (:source_file_name, :target_file_name, :file_type, :status, :error_description) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE target_file_name = :target_file_name, file_type = :file_type, status = :status, error_description = :error_description, load_date = NOW()
